title: [1.8.9]作者诈尸！|实况解说|骚操作|50余种幸运方块|欧皇的世界！
author: xiaojie_max
txt_content:
本帖最后由 xiaojie_max 于 2020-10-11 17:00 编辑 

简介brief introduction你幸运吗？又或者你不幸吗？在这个世界中，只有幸运的人能统治世界！全新系统，不再是原版基础，开局神装皆有可能！开局再也不用做出新手三件套了！满地的幸运方块，用你的双手即可统治未来!
此整合包蕴含多达25+幸运方块附属，内含幸运方块多达50+种类！不比论坛多达76+附属的帖子，也并不是抄袭，自发灵感创作，若不喜请勿喷！
Are you lucky? Or are you unlucky? In this world, only lucky people can rule the world! The new system is no longer the original foundation, and it is possible to start with a magic suit!I don't need to make a new three-piece suit at the beginning! With your hands, you can rule the future with lucky squares everywhere!This integration package contains up to 25+lucky box accessories and up to 50+kinds of lucky boxes! Not as many as 76+posts attached to the forum, nor is it plagiarism, spontaneous inspiration, if not happy, please do not spray!
前言：碎碎念Preface: broken thoughts此整合主要内容为幸运方块附属以及冒险成分！部分内容尚未汉化，未来将进行统编！前期生存，建议以幸运方块附属为主的进行冒险生存！已将幸运方块自然生成率调制较高，所需内存也有所要求，建议分配≧4000MB内存！在此，向低配朋友说声抱歉！日后我会将低配版研制而出，请低配党暂且见谅！
The main content of this integration is lucky box attachment and adventure! Part of the content has not been translated into Chinese, and will be compiled in a unified way in the future! For early survival, it is recommended that those who are mainly attached to lucky squares should take risks to survive! The natural generation rate of lucky squares has been modulated higher, and the required memory is also required. It is recommended to allocate ≧4000MB of memory! Here, I'd like to say sorry to my low-grade friends. In the future, I will develop the low-grade version. Please forgive the low-grade party for a moment!

拔地而起的遗迹！Remains rising from the ground游玩攻略Play strategy
1.创建一个世界，并启动它~
2.进入游戏后，便可四处寻找幸运方块
3.获得了一些物资，便可制作转化桌
4.制作完转化桌，可以接着升级便携式的
5.可以制作一把精准采集的镐子，用于挖掘幸运方块
6.把挖掘下来的幸运方块，放入转化桌进行学习
7.制作更多的幸运方块，进行复制
8.取出部分幸运方块，挖掘，获取物资
9.进行工业2，等科技发展
10.进行探险之旅！
11.推荐一个幸运方块就是建筑幸运方块，它能开出价值60亿的钻石塔！检验你欧皇气质的时候来了~
1. create a world and start it ~ 
2. After entering the game, you can look for lucky squares everywhere. 
3. After obtaining some materials, the conversion table can be made. 
4. After making the conversion table, you can upgrade the portable one. 
5. You can make a pick that can be accurately collected for digging lucky squares. 
6. Put the excavated lucky squares into the transformation table for learning. 
7. Make more lucky squares and copy them 
8. Take out some lucky squares, excavate and obtain materials.
9. Industrial 2, such as scientific and technological development 
10. Take an adventure trip! 
11. The recommended lucky square is the building lucky square, which can open a diamond tower worth 6 billion. The time has come to test your European imperial temperament ~
F和A问答时间F and AQuestion and answer timeF：这个整合包怎么那么像幸运物语的整合包啊？抄袭的吧!?
A : 这并不是抄袭，这完完全全是我看主播实况的灵感！

F：我该怎么玩这个包呢，我没有玩过！
A：上一个板块有进行介绍！

F：内存应该分配多少呢？会不会很卡？
A：内存建议分配≥4000MB，不能＜3500MB。3500MB至4000MB，请将视距开至2，粒子效果全部关闭，所有能调最低的就调最低，这样就不会那么卡顿。

F：为什么我下载了，打开启动器却什么都没有？
A：下两个板块有安装教程

F：如果我是UP主实况了这个整合包。。。。
A：（直接打断）没错，你可以把链接发送至下面的评论区里，我会将它布置在帖子内（能发的就尽量发下，这样也能为其他朋友示范一下玩法！）

F：如果我发现了BUG怎么办？
A：请你第一时间私信我，或者在评论区下留言，并且@我，我会处理的！

F：这些没汉化的真难受！
A：我会找时间更新汉化的，各位大侠莫急莫急！

F：如果我觉得好玩，我可以怎么做？
A：在下面留个言，为我评个金粒/人气都行呀！（切记勿水帖！）F: Why is this integration package so similar to that of fortune? Copy it! ? 
A: It's not plagiarism, it's all my inspiration to watch the host live! 

F: How should I play with this bag? I haven't! 
A: The previous section was introduced! 

F: How much memory should be allocated? Is it very hard?
A: memory allocation is recommended to be ≥4000MB and cannot be < ＜3500MB. From 3500MB to 4000MB, please turn the viewing distance to 2, the particle effect will all be turned off, and all **s that can be adjusted to the lowest level will be adjusted to the lowest level, so that they will not be stuck. 

F: Why did I download it and turn on the starter but have nothing? 
A: The next two sections have installation tutorials. 

F: If I were the UPC owner, I would live with this integration package. . . .
A: (Interrupted directly) Yes, you can send the link to the comment area below, and I will arrange it in the post (if you can, please send it as far as possible, so that you can also demonstrate the game for other friends! ) 

F: What if I find a BUG? 
A: Please write to me privately or leave a message under the comment area at the first time, and @ me, I will handle it! 

F: It's really hard not to be Chinese! 
A: I'll find time to update the localization. Great Xia, don't worry! 

F: If I feel funny, what can I do? 
A: Leave a message below and comment on my gold or popularity. (Remember not to post water! )
下载download下载地址：https://pan.baidu.com/s/1Kzip3KD6U0D5Ky8K5sParA
提取码：bwmm
安装Installation1.下载好后，先解压
2.打开HMCL启动器，创建用户名
3.将文件夹内的压缩包拖动至HMCL主界面中
4.进行安装~~~~~
5.安装完成后，设置内存
6.启动游玩~~~1. After downloading, decompress first 
2. Open the HMCL initiator and create the user name 
3. Drag the compression package in the folder to the HMCL main interface 
4. Install ~ ~ ~ ~ 
5. After the installation is completed, set up the memory 
6. Start play ~ ~ ~
必读！Required reading！请不要随意转载我的整合包，如需转载，请一定私信我！
觉得好玩，有能力的求给个评分，没能力的也可以留下你的感触！Please don't reprint my integration package at will. If you need to reprint it, please trust me personally! 
If you feel funny, ask for a score if you have the ability, and if you don't have the ability, you can leave your feelings!
漏洞BUG部分的物品贴图错误 Ver 1.1 已修复
世界景观出现少许黑点
更多门的合成工厂一旦合成门便会崩溃
游戏内无声音  这个不做修复版本，请自行按照以下步骤进行修复（需要删除一定模组）
1.打开.minecraft主文件夹，打开addons，再打开lucky_block，然后删除里面的“绿宝石附属”
2.接着退回.minecraft文件夹，打开mods文件夹，删除里面的“绿宝石附属”
3.开心的玩耍吧！Some items map error Ver 1.1 Have to repair
Appear a little black dot the landscape
Once more many synthetic factory synthetic door will collapse
No sound in the game

FPS减速器，钉钉，风滚草，腐肉烧皮革，更多傀儡，更多熔炉，更多门，更好的建筑之杖，合成冲突消除，懒人厨房，苹果核，生活调味料，修复垃圾材质，一键合成，物理掉落，潘马斯，末影接口，末影动物园，实用拓展，糖果世界，自然建筑生成，科技复兴
(近期将持续更新)
2020/4/20 Ver 1.0 Release
2020/4/21 Ver 1.1 release 
Update: 22 new modules added FPS speed reducer, nail, tumbleweed, rotten meat and burnt leather, more puppets, more melting pots, more doors, better building poles, elimination of synthetic conflicts, lazy kitchen, apple core, life seasoning, repair of garbage materials, one-touch synthesis, physical drop, Pamas, Moying interface, Moying zoo, practical expansion, candy world, natural building generation, technological revival
(to be updated continuously in the near future)

replies.author: 迷灬离
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 迷离fyx 于 2020-4-22 17:22 编辑 

本来觉得看着不错，结果有很多槽点：
1.幸运方块不够多，一般是上百个通过串联达到一个好的游玩，但是我看不到任何串联，纯粹只是加到一起.
2.优化非常差，往往上一帧才加载完下一图就来了，中间有一个卡顿式的重叠，而我分的远远超出建议内存此处指我换了个内存条
3.小地图选择问题，虽然这可能只是个人感觉，但旅行地图完全不能把幸运方块的乐趣发挥，标记点也串联了（你就不能删下标记点再发？）4.安装慢，往往会伴随着安装失败
5.没有声音
总之就是一句话：不好玩，差评！
